nodes.text: It is crucial that this specialized  form of bankruptcy relief for family  farmers not be allowed to sunset
family  farmers absent chapter 12 would be  forced to file for bankruptcy relief  under the Bankruptcy Code's other al-ternatives  none of which work as well  for them as does chapter 12.
If family famers would in the absence of chapter 12 be forced to file for bankrubtcy it is crucial that chapter 12 be kept in place.
The need for chapter 12 is not only continuing but is increasing.
If the need for chapter 12 is not only continuing but is increasing it is crucial that chapter 12 be kept in place.
recent statistics dem-onstrate  that there is not only a con-tinuing  need for chapter 12 but that  this need is apparently increasing.
If recent statistics demonstrate that the need for chapter 12 is apparently increasing the need for chapter 12 is increasing
Ac-cording  to the Administrative Office of  the United States Courts chapter 12  bankruptcy filings jumped by more  than 62 percent over the past year.
If the Administrative Office claims that bankruptcy filings jumped by more than 62 percent over the past year  recent statistics indicate that there is an increasing need for chapter 12.
